value.name: Suspect failed his 'last chance' at probation 2 months before shooting Utah deputies
value.description: Joshua Michael Johnson had been a fugitive for more than two months by the time a pair of Salt Lake County Sheriff’s deputies approached him on the lawn outside a police station on April 10.

value.name: Two deputies shot outside Salt Lake County sheriff’s headquarters identified Sunday
value.description: Two sheriff’s deputies, Joshua Buerke and Leland Grossett, took gunfire to the face after a welfare check inexplicably turned violent Saturday outside the Salt Lake County sheriff’s headquarters.
